Text: Not working with 2.601, RelicCOH.exe, and validators are the same bit size as original.

Doesn't work. Alternate of running Company of Heroes with latest 2.6 patch is to disconnect your internet connection when starting the game up. It'll ask you for the disc, so just use PowerISO or whatever to have a disc available.

Another alternative is to set your firewall to block RELICCOH.EXE.
